alert.note: Alert for Admiralty Inlet Area; Eastern Strait of Juan de Fuca; Western Skagit County; Western Strait of Juan De Fuca (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 24 at 6:46PM PST until December 26 at 4:00PM PST by NWS Seattle
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 4 AM SATURDAY TO 4 PM PST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 11 inches. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Portions of northwest Washington. * WHEN...From 4 AM Saturday to 4 PM PST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow will most likely develop in showers and bands, leading to highly variable snow accumulations. The best timing for heavier snow is Saturday afternoon into Sunday morning.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. For the latest road conditions in Washington state, call 5 1 1.
